title: If Biden's Bill Passes, It's the Endgame | Guest: Bill O'Reilly | 10/22/21
description:
Glenn and Pat discuss a radical opinion article from the Washington Times regarding Saule Omarova's banking opinions. Attorney General Merrick Garland was questioned about the sexual assault case from Loudoun County, and he claimed ignorance of the issue. Bill O’Reilly joins for his weekly news recap, including President Biden’s continual fall in approval ratings and his recent town hall. Head writer Jason Buttrill, a former Marine, joins to discuss how he’s viewed and handled the fall of Afghanistan. Glenn previews a segment from his latest TV special that every service member must watch. Glenn, Pat, and Jason discuss Facebook’s name change, asset forfeiture, and how everything is in lockstep to gain control over you.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
